original_title: Your World As I See It
overview: As seen through the eyes of Ernest's over-educated alter-ego, Astor Clement will attempt to unlock the sociological mysteries of our times. Astor will describe a unique event or ritual that lies at the very heart of the common man's existence. Then Ernest, with the help of his family members, also played by Jim Varney, will bring that ritual to life with non-stop, slap-stick comedy action.
tagline: Ernest and his unique family give us numerous views of life from the shallow end of the gene pool.
title: Your World As I See It
